black_cat.name: Black Cat Half Brick
black_cat.description: Used in the movie Home Aone

bunker_bombs.name: Bunker Bombs
bunker_bombs.description: The most exciting way to lose a finger or two

desert_smoke.name: Desert Smoke
desert_smoke.description: In case you need to desigate an LZ in the desert

fairy_sparklers.name: RPG-29 Vampir
fairy_sparklers.description: A Russian rocked-propelled grenade launcher that can penetrate the frontal hulls of Western composite-armored main battle tanks.

fairy_sparklers.name: BGM-71 TOW
fairy_sparklers.description: TOW ('Tube-launched, Optically tracked, Wire-guided') is an American anti-tank missile. It can be found in a wide variety of manually carried and vehicle mounted forms, as well as widespread use on helicopters.

fairy_sparklers.name: AGM-114 Hellfire
fairy_sparklers.description: An air-to-surface missile first developed for anti-armor use, but later models were developed for precision strikes against other target types.
